name: Venomous Bite
url: pfsrd://Monster Codex/Rules/Goblins/Example Goblins/Mutant Goblin/Mutant Goblin/Creating a Mutant Goblin/Mutations/Venomous Bite

sections.body: : The mutant goblin grows large fangs, gaining a poisonous bite as a natural attack that deals damage appropriate to its size. The poison functions like wyvern poison, except its DC is 10 + 1/2 HD + its Constitution modifier.
